name: Bob's Adventure (donedgardo)
description:
Game made on Bevy Game Jam.
Theme Side Effects.

Enjoy this Top-down sci-fi adventure where you get to play as a interplanetary species and explore different world. 

Play it on the web if itch.io not working: https://bobsadventure.edgardocarreras.com

Every single line of code, pixel and sound created by me: Edgardo Carreras
MIT / Apache-2.0 
Source code: https://github.com/donedgardo/bevy_jam_side_effect

PS: Only the herb item works atm, feel free to explore the world and interact with beings and items!
